alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 1:39PM EDT until August 06 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1239 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lynn Haven, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Springfield, Hiland Park, Nixon, Bayhead, Southport, Recota Beach, College Station, Saunders, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Cairo, Brannonville, Vicksburg and Majette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
